title: RHONY: All's Well That Ends Wells Fargo
description:
After two weeks of being on their best behavior, The Real Housewives of New York finally let their inner maniacs out with petty bickering and another classic Sonja Morgan drunken meltdown. This was the messy disaster we've been waiting for.This episode is available on Crappens on Demand. Check it out here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/51459797

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
